price: بې شکه ستاسو معبود هماغه الله دى چې له هغه پرته كوم بل معبود نشته، له هر څه نه د هغه علم راچاپېر دى.
arabic: إِنَّمَآ إِلَٰهُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ وَسِعَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ عِلۡمٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: innamā ilāhukumu al-lahu alladhī lā ilāha illā huwa wasiʿa kulla shayin ʿil'man
